groups.name: cx
groups.description: Configuration items governing CxSAST Dynamic Engines behavior

groups.name: cx-engine
groups.description: Configuration for declaring engine pools for CxSAST Dynamic Engines

properties.name: cx.cxEnginePrefix
properties.description: Prefix for dynamic engine name when registering with CxManager

properties.name: cx.cxEngineUseSSL
properties.description: If 'true', register CxEngines with https: protocol, otherwise http: will be used

properties.name: cx.expireEngineBufferMins
properties.description: Amount of time in minutes to use as a buffer for expiring engines

properties.name: cx.idleMonitorSecs
properties.description: Period to use for checking for idle engines

properties.name: cx.queueIntervalSecs
properties.description: Cx queue polling interval in seconds

properties.name: cx.queueingEngineName
properties.description: Name of the blocked engines used for to prevent scans from failing

properties.name: cx.terminateOnStop
properties.description: If 'true', terminate engine when idle engine expires; otherwise, stop engine

properties.name: cx.userAgent
properties.description: String to use for the the HTTP User-Agent during Rest requests

properties.name: cx.notificationId
properties.description: Identifier used when sending alert notifications. Format depends on Notification provider.

properties.name: cx-engine.engineExpireIntervalSecs
properties.description: Expiration time interval for a dynamic engine

properties.name: cx-engine.enginePrefix
properties.description: The prefix to prepend to IAAS engine server names
